game.name: Dofamine VR
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Tracked Controller Support, VR Only, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Dopamine VR은 첫 번째 사람 시점의 퍼즐 게임으로, 과학 소설 장르에 속합니다. 플레이어는 '신의 입자'인 힉스 보손을 제어하는 실험이 이루어진 과학 연구 복합체에서 발생한 재앙적인 사건을 조사하는 미로 같은 수수께끼를 풀어야 합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An atmospheric first-person VR puzzle game: explore a science facility, solve mysteries, uncover the cause of catastrophe. Single-player experience.

reviewHighlights.text: I really liked the VR puzzle game as a first experience, and for the price of a pack of chips, it's an great game. I recommend. Those who like puzzles...
Dofamine VR is a solid atmospheric puzzle game. It focuses on investigation and logic in a detailed sci-fi lab environment
